name: Rootin' Shootin': Root Veg, Shoot Veg
name_original: Rootin' Shootin': Root Veg, Shoot Veg
description:
"To the town of Agua Fennell

Rode a Carrot one fine day"

Rootin' Shootin' is a top down, third person shooter made by team Bingle for the 2023 Global Game Jam.

The heroic carrot Butch Carroty is ambushed in the town of Agua Fennell by a group of evil non-root Vegetables. Play as Butch and pull Ammo from the ground to reload your weapon, trying to survive the onslaught as long as possible.

Controls

MovementWASDFire WeaponLeft MousePick up Vegetable (Reload)E

Team Bingle:

Programming: Harry, Jaccc

Art: Sophie, Faith

Design: Neo

Audio: Eden
